sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { AllServicesService } from 'src/app/services/all-services.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { constructor (private service: AllServicesService, private router:Router) { } formdata = { email: '', password: '' } login () { this.service.login(this.formdata).subscribe((res: any) => { localStorage.setItem("email", res.user.email) this.router.navigate(["/"]) }) } }

Login
